title: What is the name of the song of which Kamariya was copied? - Quora

response.answer_text: The original song is Bhammariya Re Laal. You can listen to the original Gujarati folk song here: Pethal Pur Ma (sung by Praful Dave and Vatsala Patel) This is a garba dance to the song:  Dandiya raas with this song:

Music, composed by Deepak Dev, later came under the scanner that the tune was copied from an old Christian devotional song, composed by Jerson Antony. Long, netizens came out with claims that the song, composed by Sreejith and Sachin, is a straight lift from the Bengali album Ekla Protham. Ref. Times of India
